name: Goatlings - Battle Center tweaks
description: Little tweaks for the battle center! Makes all the baddies fit in one page and makes the weapons and end battle buttons larger.
additional_info: Feel free to change the colors for the buttons on colorpicker as well as the size of the weapons, baddies, etc. Update on 9/7/18: Added tweaks for the training center. Update on 9/7/18: Made the default colors match the site a bit more.
